original_body_lines: Mirage is a big attraction at the Hilton Seychelles Labriz Resort & Spa, nestled on Silhouette Island, the third-largest island in the Seychelles archipelago.
With 111 villas dotting the landscape, the resort unfolds a picturesque coastline for its guests, providing a breathtaking backdrop for an unforgettable stay.
Mirage is featured at the Lo Brizon Bar at the Hilton Seychelles Labriz Resort & Spa.
They moved into action on December 6th and their evening performance will continue till December 29th.
Opening night was quite interesting, and the crowd enjoyed their music, says Benjy, adding that they are now working on some songs in the main language spoken in the Seychelles.
“We did one that has a slight baila beat and it went down well with the guests.”

According to the Resort’s F and B Manager, Tania Fernandus, Labriz Gastrolounge, on the main island of the Seychelles, Mahe, is set to celebrate the festive season with Mirage on Christmas Eve, 24th night, and New Year’s Eve, December 31st.
Mirage will be back in town mid-January, 2024, and, a couple of weeks later, will take wing to Australia.
